DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety profile of CSL425 (CSL's 2009 H1N1 influenza vaccine) in a healthy pediatric population.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of CSL's 2009 H1N1 Influenza Vaccine (CSL425) in a Healthy Pediatric Population in the USA
DOC.criteria: Male or female aged >= 6 months to < 9 years at the time of the first study vaccination. For children < 3 years of age at the time of first vaccination, born at or after 36 weeks gestation. Known hypersensitivity to a previous dose of influenza virus vaccine or allergy to eggs, chicken protein, neomycin, polymyxin, or any components of the Study Vaccine
